channel.title: Asproject [beta] - 317
channel.description:
[center][URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/as2%20pictures/as.png][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/as2%20pictures/as.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Webclient[/b] [img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/81/1zl4uj71.png[/img][url=http://asproject.tk]Click here[/url] [b]Forums[/b] [img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/7375/forums1.png[/img][url=http://ancientscapepk.smfforfree3.com/index.php?action=forum]Click here[/url]
[b]AncientScape 1[/b] AncientScape 1 can still be played by downloading the client on the forums. [b]AncientScape 2[/b] Ancientscape 2 can be played at asproject.tk.
[b]ASPROJECT IS STILL IN BETA[/b]
[center][b]Features![/b] -Great Economy -Great membership benefits -Completionist and max cape -Tutorial island -Spirit shields with proper effects -Duel arena -Godwars bosses -Level points -Prestiging -Revamped PvP System -Perfect shopping -Pest control -Amazing pking -Buy 100, sell 100 -No rollbacks -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -Storm of armadyl -Gold scrolls -Single players dungeons -Money vault -Dicing -20+ man raids -Tasks
[b]Pictures[/b]

item.title: Asproject [beta] - 317
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

[quote=“scimi blood, post:5, topic:538439”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=657265.msg4397300#msg4397300 date=1389504076]
Gonna play it unless I’m stuck running around with a dragon scimmy and rune with a helm of Metz
[/quote] Nah, its not hard to get armour and weapons really, when I add some new bosses it shouldnt be that hard for sure :P[/quote]

Okay then I’ll try your server out when I get the chance

Read full topic
